text:
Liga
Barca: Ansu Fati's declaration of love
Revelation of Blaugrana this season, the striker intends to win the club for which he hopes to play his life.
07 Nov 2019, 09:40 by Thomas Rassouli



It is the only satisfaction or almost of the season for Bar√ßa currently. While the Catalans face a crisis of results as well in the league as in the Champions League, Ansu Fati took advantage of the absences and forms of each to make his place, and to reveal himself at the highest level since September.
The 17-year-old striker, who was still unknown a few months ago, was able to score his first goals with his training club, and especially at Camp Nou, an unforgettable moment for him. Naturalized Spanish, it now tastes the joys of selection.




"I hope I can stay here all my life"




Ansu Fati, Lionel Messi + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

At the microphone of the television of his club, the new nugget that makes the headlines of Sports this Thursday declared his love for his club of heart, and aims for great things for the rest of his career. "I always wanted to be here." says the attacker. "It was my starting idea, and I hope I can stay here all my life."
